txt.en:
'The expert version of this event will require you to impress us with your amazing strength, balance, and determination.

'You will receive a mighty dwarf-club from me, should you choose to participate, and you may use this club to bash your fellow competitors all about the arena. Most importantly, you need to collect the Glorious Beer without being knocked out of the arena. If you manage to achieve all of this, the greatest rewards will be yours!'

<rgb=#FF0000>In the expert version of the quest, you will need to collect the Glorious Beer which will randomly appear on one of the tables. Be careful not to leave the arena at any time -- try to stay away from other players which may be able to knock you out of bounds. You will also still need to strike other players: simply target a nearby player and use the item.

Hint: Knock away a player who is going for the beer, then grab it for yourself!</rgb>
